meanings: (중단하다, 중지하다) stop, cease, drop, (학교·직장 등을) leave, (informal) quit, (항상 하던 일을) give up, (사임하다) resign
직장에서의 표현 I'm quitting my job because the working conditions are bad.

vlive.korean: 아쉬울 때 그만둬요? I should stop if I'm feeling a bit disappointed? 듣기 View video ASTRO : 나혼자LIVE #01 777 아트쇼! (Art Show!)
vlive.english: I should stop if I'm feeling a bit disappointed?

vlive.korean: 자꾸 욕만 하고 그러시니까 그만둬요. Please don't say mean things to them. 듣기 View video HUH GAK : HuhGak (허각)의 #떨려 라이브
vlive.english: Please don't say mean things to them.

vlive.korean: "그럼 그만 둬" 너무 쿨하게 얘기하는 거예요. He said, "Then you should quit." 듣기 View video V COOKIE : [Replay] HANHAE & HENNEY's 한해&헤니의 힙합라이브
스케치를 하다가 안 되면 그만 둬요. I try things out, but if it doesn't sound nice I just give up. 듣기 View video UNIQ : 팬들의 사랑을 먹고 자라는 성주, 승연❤️
vlive.english: I try things out, but if it doesn't sound nice I just give up.

vlive.korean: [ID] "라헬아, 그만 둬". - 하하! - 우리가 미안해... [ID] "RACHEL, stop that". - Haha! - We're sorry for that... 듣기 View video IDOL x IDOL : A.DE - 에이디이 '초심 속으로 1탄 해영-초윤!!'
vlive.english: [ID] "RACHEL, stop that". - Haha! - We're sorry for that...
